title.narrative: Kontrakt med ECFR ift. Libyen konference - BXL og CPH

description.narrative:
The overall objective of the smaller policy seminar in Brussels is to ehance EU support for implementation of the UN Action Plan for Libya. The meeting would aim to enhance interaction among EU member states in support of the UN Action Plan. Drawing together Libya policy leads in the EU and key member states along with UN actors, it would focus on aligning European and UN understanding of and next steps regarding Action Plan's three main components: a transitional unity government, national conference and a constitutional referendum.
The overall objectives of the bigger public Libya Conference in Copenhagen in October is Threefold: 1. Take stock of the implementation of the UN Action Plan 2. Assess the situation in Libya in a broader regional perspective 3. Discusss possibilities for an increased Danish and European strategic engagement in Libya within the humanitarian-stabilization-development nexus.
